feed.title: Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING, Algonquin Park (Lake of Two Rivers)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:02 a.m. EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Humidity: 52 %
Dewpoint: -5.3°C
Wind: E 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday night: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening. 60 percent chance of ice pellets or freezing rain overnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Ice pellets or freezing rain changing to freezing rain late in the morning then to rain in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late in the afternoon. Ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Showers. Temperature rising to 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Showers ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of a thunderstorm in the evening and after midnight. Wind southeast 30 km/h becoming light near midnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 before morning. Temperature rising to 11 by morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High 6. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
